title: Richbased
author: Richbased
content: I've a total of 10 days log in time today since i joined this life transforming bitcointalk forum and i must confess that the experience i've gotten so far is amazing. At first when i joined this forum newly on 16th july 2023, i was finding it difficult to navigate and understand the activities of the forum, i spent almost a month watching and learning about the forum and i started getting accustomed to how the forum works then i began to give my opinion towards other people's thread, as time goes on i began creating threads as well and what amazed me most was when i started receiving merits from quality posts i've made, getting these merit increased my morale to study more and give more vital ideas on topics that are being discussed in the forum. As days goes by thats how my activity started growing and merits awarded to my quality posts. My activity now has reach the level of a full member but my total merit hasn't gotten to the number required before being confirmed a full member. I believe with time i will reach the desired merits that will increase my ranks accordingly. I encourage everyone that is new to this forum to spend more time learning from this forum rather than jumping into making posts that will become irrelevant or has no meaning to offer any idea to the forum. I'm also happy to be a member of a signature campaign and i believe i will do my best to my benefit and also to the benefit of the signature campaign i am representing.I know most people will say it's too early to celebrate my stay in this bitcointalk forum but i tell you in this life we need to appreciate our little beginning so that it can give us an edge towards achieving great success tomorrow.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: My dear, celebrate your little win cause it takes patient and determination to even to come to the point you've attained now. Before you go count 1000, you go first count 1 till 10, then 100, and you continue moving gradually until you finally reach your destination. And they funny thing is that even after you've become an hero or legendary member, if you've not been grateful for this little fit, chances are that you won't appreciate it when you get to the top. The effort, commitment and consistency. keep learning, keep growing and never give up along the way.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Congratulations on your achievement if you deem to call it so, I remember when I started to I was so eager to grow just like you mate and it's nice to see that you celebrate the little things cause it's good so that when you have finally reached there you would recognize how far you have come from the start of everything and believe if you are serious it's just a matter of time and before you know you are already there.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: I understand the area of the thread and it is good thread to encourage newbies. Op you don't have to worry. One thing I know in the forum is activity and since your activity has reached your next rank then you have to make some more quality post to have more merits rewards so you can rank up very fast. All your focus right now is for quality posts and not the opposite. You can make comments at all corners and make sure your comments are meritable. Everyone will pass through this stage and all those users from full members and above has passed through this stage so yours is not the first. But I still encourage you to do well so you can get the desire merits to rank up and achieve you aims here.

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: You are trying and especially the way you reply your post to give a general overview towards a post show that you are gradually getting matured in the forum. I also like the fact that you have come to acknowledge the forum most people do not care about their total performance or how people sees them like me I do asked questions to people to give their overall view towards my post and activities and they rated me fine from then it gave me the vibes and energy to gear up than my previous performance.

comments.body: Op congratulation for this achievement, no reason am say na small thing wey you don achieve, only this one na evidence say you dey do enough reading and you be contributor for this forum, as I dey like sef I never reach reach 10 active days for this forum. Concerning the merit part, me I go say na God dey run am, because most times na our lower quality post them naim dey get merit pass some high quality, most times some quality post no dey even get 1 merit sef, no be say people no find am useful oo, na just because some times dem no get smerit to give at that time or dem no feel like to give at that time. Anyways the only advise I get na be say make you keep the good work up, and continue as a good contributor for this forum, one day you go reach where you wan go.

comments.author: Pi-network314159
comments.body: Op you don try o. E no dey easy atol! To grow for this place  just be like a very big war. E no dey easy sha. Nothing good com so easy if we start something make we give am our best time to see the results. Consistency can not be underestimated or it's important can not be over emphasized. Sometimes wetting dey make us they get issues na lack of focus. When you do one thing small just say nothing come out that moment you don vex go find another one. Forgetting say time dey go before you go come to realization say no be the right part you choose time don already go. As all of us dey grow, make we they advised and  encourage ourselves, we all way dey this forum be like brothers. and here don become our office. No mind as we no dey see each other, but I believe we go Sabi each other someday.
